abstract.t: In this document, we propose a new multicast protocol called SEM(Simple Explicit Multicast) or simple Xcast. This protocol uses anefficient method to construct the multicast tree and delivermulticast packets. In order to construct the multicast tree, thisprotocol uses the same mechanism as Xcast+.For the delivery of multicast packets it uses the mechanismof branching routers similar to the mechanism used in REUNITE Iand REUNITE II.
